EmailTemplate.name: MSP Standard Renewal Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: MSP Standard Renewal Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued MSP Customer,
Our records indicate to date we have not received the MSP renewal contract for your aircraft, (AIRCRAFT TYPE & SN).
Please note your contract will expire on (DATE XXXX). If this occurs, it will impact your ability to report usage online and can also delay approvals for parts ordering and service.
If you would like to renew, please fill out and return the following contract pages (if applicable):
Engines
Pages 1 and 15
Page 20 Gold Addendum (Optional)
APU
Pages 1 and 14
Page 19 Gold Addendum (Optional)
Note: Additional Standard Addendum (attached) is only required when the Registered Owner is not the signer on the contract.
If you have decided not to renew, please respond to this email confirming such so we can update our records.
Should you have any questions or concerns, do not hesitate to contact us. We thank you in advance for your attention.
Kind regards,
MSP Contracts
Honeywell Aerospace
1944 E Sky Harbor Circle (M/S 2102-229)
Phoenix, AZ 85034
Tel: 602-365-3099 Opt 2.4
E-Fax: 602-822-7502
mspcontracts@honeywell.com
